name: Google Fontface on Discord, and other websites
description: Google's font for the Discord platform. Also, some funny easter eggs that you'll discover after installing ; )

user.name: Interveon82
user.about: Coding sometimes... but I like design in general since I also make logos and music album covers so why not try to bring some custom original ideas to the sites I've been to?

additional_info:
Log

version 2.0.6-202206082311 - Minor changes version 2.0.2-202203051403 - Changed the fontface from "Product Sans" to mainly "Google Sans Text". - Settled one Easter Egg on YouTube version 1.0-202201072051 Release version. Infos If you don't see the Product Sans font, it might be cause of an network connection problem. Advanced: otherwise, if you are sure you can see and connect to the (fonts.)gstatic.com website [You'll see "Google. 404. That’s an error. The requested URL / was not found on this server. That’s all we know." instead of a network error] contact me in Discord for feedback.
